title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets, but his final mission requires planting an idea deep inside a target's mind.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker wrongly imprisoned forms a deep friendship and quietly plans a long path toward hope and freedom.

title: The Godfather
description: The powerful Corleone family faces betrayal, loyalty, and violence as the youngest son is drawn into the world of organized crime.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge when the Joker unleashes chaos across Gotham, pushing the hero to his moral limits.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity as Earth slowly becomes uninhabitable.

title: Detective Conan: The Million-dollar Pentagram
description: Based on the manga series Detective Conan by Gosho Aoyama. Conan is pulled into a high-stakes case involving hidden treasure, deadly traps, and a mysterious figure tied to the past.
